Filing Taxes Is Hard Enough. Congress Should Ease the Pain, Not Worsen It.

Tax complexity is their friend, not ours

Washington Post
Apr 14

By Christine Emba

For the first time in a long time, I managed to do my taxes early this year.

My refund check arrived by mail. Opening it, I looked down at the (paltry) sum, sighed and placed the letter into my bag. And…
